CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y         build-essential         cmake         git         libcurl4-openssl-dev         libpulse-dev         libssl-dev         uuid-dev         wget         xz-utils         zlib1g-dev     && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/ &&     cd /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/ &&     wget http://releases.llvm.org/7.0.1/clang+llvm-7.0.1-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-16.04.tar.xz -O -          | tar -x -I xz --strip-components=1 &&     for file in bin/*;     do         ln -s $PWD/$file /usr/bin/$(basename $file)-7.0;     done &&     cp /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/lib/libomp.so /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/lib/libomp.so.5
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir -p /tmp/aws-sdk-cpp &&     cd /tmp/aws-sdk-cpp &&     wget https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-cpp/archive/1.7.138.tar.gz -O -         | tar -xz --strip-components=1 &&     mkdir -p /tmp/aws-sdk-cpp/build &&     cd /tmp/aws-sdk-cpp/build &&     CXX=clang++-7.0 CC=clang-7.0         cmake             -DBUILD_ONLY="dynamodb;lambda;s3;sqs"             -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug             -DCPP_STANDARD=17             -DENABLE_TESTING=OFF             -DCUSTOM_MEMORY_MANAGEMENT=OFF             -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/aws-sdk-cpp-1.7/             -DAWS_DEPS_INSTALL_DIR:STRING=/opt/aws-sdk-cpp-1.7/             .. &&     make install &&     rm -rf /tmp/aws-sdk-cpp
Commands.Name: run
